text:
Hiya, so I'm a beginner. I'm learning After Effects and Cinema 4d at Escape Studios. I'm looking to change my career from retail to a motion graphics designer. I'm putting together a showreel but it won't be ready until the end of August. I would happy to do some interning or shadow other designers. I am leaving my current job next week so that I can focus my energy into improving my skills.

 I'm speaking to lots of people for advice on how to get started and what it is like to freelance.

:)
